title: Microsoft SDE2 Offer received
content:
Education: Bachelors Electronics
Years of Experience: 7.9 Yrs
Domain:  Embedded Systems (Firmware)
Current company: Service based VLSI Company 
Current CTC: 50L (no bonus no stocks)
Date of the Offer: 15th Oct, 2024

Company: MS
Title/Level: L62
Location: Noida/BLR
Salary: 40LPA
Signing Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: 90K $
Bonus: 0-20% (10% in most cases i.e. 4L)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 40L + 3L + 4L + 18L = 65L
Benefits: Standard Microsoft benefits

In discussion with Amazon at the moment for SDE-2 position. One round is pending. No other offer in hand.
I have 3 days to accept/reject this offer. I was expecting L63 SSE position for my experience. Trying to negotiate on Stocks and Joining Bonus.
Any idea how can I boost the overall package?

title: JP Morgan SDE-3 Compensation
content:
Education: BTech from Tier - 1 college (Top NIT )
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience:  Big bank based in Banglore.

Company: JP Morgan Chase
Title/Level: SDE-3
Location: Banglore
Date of offer : Oct 2024
Salary: 35L
Bonus: Performance bonus at end of the year.
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 39 LPA Approx ( 35L + Performance bonus) 

Please suggest based on how is the work culture at JP Morgan. I heard bonuses are bad?

title: Salesforce SMTS Offer
content:
Years of Experience: 6.7
Date of the Offer: Oct 2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level:  SMTS
Location: Hyderabad
Salary:  53 LPA Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus:  0
Stock bonus:  68k$RSU 
Bonus: 15% variable bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  ~75LPA INR
Benefits: Standard Salesforce benfits

Current Comp :  33base + 10% bonus + 48k$ RSU= ~48 LPA INR(Joined 1 month back)
Previous comp : 21 LPA
Competing Offers : None

Is this good offer for SMTS, As I saw many got higher offer for SMTS on leetcode. Feels its on lower side of range.

title: Everstage | Intern + FTE (SDE) | Chennai
content:
Education: Tier 1 College
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 6 months SDE Internship
Date of the Offer: October 2024
Company: Everstage
Location: Chennai
Title: SDE Intern + FTE
Stipend: 60000
Salary: 12 LPA
Stock bonus: 2 Lakhs
Total comp (Salary + bonus): 14 Lakhs
Benefits: Unlimited PTO and free food

title: Razorpay || SDE-1
content:
Education: Bachelors from a Tier-2 College
Current Comp - 12LPA
Years of Experience: ~1
Date of the Offer: July
Company: Razorpay
Title/Level: SDE 1
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: 15 LPA + Relocation
Stock bonus: 8L INR (25% vested over 4 years)
No performance bonus
Total comp (1st year) - ~17LPA

Now I am confused whether I can negotiate on this and what can I take it up to, since I feel this is lowballed.
